00024 // Helper structure for the STATIC_CHECK macro

00027     template<int> struct CompileTimeError;
00028     template<> struct CompileTimeError<true> {};

00032 // macro STATIC_CHECK
00033 // Invocation: STATIC_CHECK(expr, id)
00034 // where:
00035 // expr is a compile-time integral or pointer expression
00036 // id is a C++ identifier that does not need to be defined
00037 // If expr is zero, id will appear in a compile-time error message.
00039 
00040 #define LOKI_STATIC_CHECK(expr, msg) \
00041     { Loki::CompileTimeError<((expr) != 0)> ERROR_##msg; (void)ERROR_##msg; }
